titleStmt.title: The third part of The true vvatch containing the call of the Lord, to awake all sorts to meet him with intreatie of peace, and to turne unto him by true repentance: shewing what causes we have forthwith to betake our selves to watching and prayer. Taken out of the vision of Ezekiel, chap. 9. By Iohn Brinsley.
True watch. Part 3
titleStmt.author: Brinsley, John, fl. 1581-1624.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Iohn Haviland for Thomas Pavier, and are to be sold at his shop in Ivie lane,

notesStmt.note: With the text of Ezekiel IX in the Authorised version.
Reproduction of the original in Cambridge University Library.
Engraved title page to STC 3787 inserted.
